summary: This document is the Certificate of Incorporation for JEGE, Inc., filed in the State of Delaware. It outlines the corporation's name, registered office, purpose, stock details, and the role of the incorporator, Darren Indyke, who is responsible for the formation of the corporation.

persons.name: Darren Indyke
persons.context: Darren Indyke is named as the sole incorporator of JEGE, Inc., responsible for filing the Certificate of Incorporation.

persons.name: J Epstein
persons.context: J Epstein is mentioned in the context of the document's filing, indicating involvement with the corporation.

connections.description: Darren Indyke is associated with J Epstein in the context of forming the corporation.

locations: 1209 Orange Street, Wilmington, New Castle, Delaware
457 Madison Avenue, Fourth Floor, New York, New York
keyFacts: The corporation is named JEGE, Inc.
The registered office is located at 1209 Orange Street, Wilmington, Delaware.
Darren Indyke is the sole incorporator of the corporation.
The corporation is authorized to issue 1,500 shares of common stock.
The document outlines the limitations of liability for directors of the corporation.
